channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The UN mission appeals to the Taliban to restore internet access in Afghanistan

item.title: Energy Dept. tells employees not to use words including 'climate change' and 'green'

item.title: South African Ambassador to France Is Found Dead in Paris
item.description: The ambassador, Nkosinathi Emmanuel Mthethwa, was found outside a hotel on the western edge of the city, a day after his wife reported him missing.
